data.title: Netflix Is A Joke Festival 2024
data.meta_description: Netflix Is A Joke Fest is back in 2024… The largest comedy event in history is taking over LA May 2 - 12, 2024 with more than three hundred shows at thirty five venues. See your favorite stand-up acts, podcast recordings, table reads, live tapings for Netflix specials, and much more. Tickets and info at netflixisajokefest.com
data.text: SETH ROGEN is an award winning actor, writer, producer, director, entrepreneur and philanthropist. Alongside longtime collaborators Evan Goldberg and James Weaver, he produces film and television projects through their production company, Point Grey Pictures. On the television side, Rogen produced and starred alongside Lily James and Sebastian Stan in Hulu’s Emmy® Award-winning series PAM & TOMMY and the Peacock docuseries PAUL T. GOLDMAN. Recently, Rogen starred in Apple TV+’s PLATONIC_,_ a half-hour comedy series. On the film side, Rogen starred in Steven Spielberg's semi autobiographical Academy Award®-nominated film THE FABELMANS as the “favorite uncle of young Spielberg” alongside Michelle Williams and Paul Dano. Rogen produced and starred in the film TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM from Nickelodeon and Point Grey Pictures, as well as the long awaited animated adaptation of THE SUPER MARIO BROS. MOVIE, where he lent his voice as the iconic “Donkey Kong.” In addition, Rogen produced Lionsgate’s film JOYRIDE_,_ which garnered CinemaCons 2023 Comedy Ensemble of the Year Award and Lionsgate’s film COBWEB.
